full_summary:
### Tender Announcement
#### Procurement Title
Proximate Analyzer

#### Solicitation Information
- **Procurement Reference Number**: WS3740088635-Doc3740094388
- **Amendment Number**: 1 (rsu::amendment amendment)
- **Solicitation Number**: WS3740088635
- **Publication Date**: November 21, 2022
- **Tender Closing Date**: December 22, 2022 at 14:00 EST
- **Amendment Date**: December 16, 2022

#### Tender Details
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) of the Government of Canada, on behalf of the Department of Natural Resources (NRCan), is soliciting bids for the supply, delivery, and offloading of one (1) Proximate analyzer for the Wood Characterization Laboratory at the Northern Forestry Centre in Edmonton, Alberta.

#### Specifications and Requirements
The amendment extends the deadline for submitting the required supporting documentation and bid submission to 14:00 EST on December 22, 2022. Bids submitted after this time will not be considered. The procurement is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) and a preference for Canadian goods.

#### Procurement Category and Type
*  Procurement Category: Goods
*  Procurement Method: Competitive - Open bidding
*  Notice type: Request for Proposal

#### Evaluation Criteria
The lowest price will be used as the sole evaluation criterion to select the bidder.

#### Tender Contact Information
- **Contact Person**: Erin Kaiser
- **Contact Email**: [erin.kaiser@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:erin.kaiser@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
- **Notice URL**: http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14692873?extsite=MTQ2OTI4NzNfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

#### Related Documents
Please refer to the attached documents (if provided) and the notice URL above for further details on tender requirements and evaluation criteria.
